scripts.init-database: npx prisma db push && npm run init-read-replica
scripts.init-read-replica: npx prisma db push --schema ./node_modules/prisma-read-replica-middleware/prisma/combined-read-replica-schema.prisma && prisma-read-replica-middleware generate --schema ./prisma/schema.prisma --readReplicaSchema ./prisma/read-replica-schema.prisma
